name: Chigago (African dodge-ball)
description: Chigago (African dodge-ball) is an open source video game for all to enjoy. The video game was inspired by the popular South African recreational game of the same name (aka "Bhathi", "Driepoties", "Chingwi", "Amatin"). It is licensed under the GNU General Public License, version 3 or later. For more info, contact chigago.devops@gmail.com
